p: The group at high risk of severe COVID-19 was defined according to the criteria of the Dutch National Institute for Public Health and the Environment (RIVM) [ 1], and included participants aged 70 or higher, and participants with asthma and COPD, diabetes, cancer, participants with current use of antineoplastic and immunosuppressive agents, obesity, end-stage kidney disease, liver steatosis and cirrhosis and cardiac diseases.
